meanings.definition: A slang term for police officers.
meanings.sent1: The smokeys helped direct traffic after the accident.
meanings.sent2: The smokeys patrolled the neighborhood to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: Why did the smokeys give the speeding car a ticket? To remind them to drive safely!
meanings.sent4: The smokeys are the guardians of the law, always watching over us.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the smokeys in their uniforms instills a sense of security in the community.
